name: Alien Medicine
description:
You're a robot built to cure an Alien that is being attacked by parasites... From inside. 

Figure it out the best way to do it, or, more likely… he will die!

Controls
  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to aim
  • Esc to pause

Good luck (:

Game by PIPS team: Adriel Araujo, Antonio Sergio, João Victor Ribeiro
